hero-par.par1: Made with Indonesia Finest Beans for your everyday modern coffee experience
hero-par.par2: Prestigious annual competition for Fore baristas throughout Indonesia
hero-par.par3: Made of 450 kg recycled plastic located at Kuningan City Mall, Jakarta

our-story.title: Our Story
our-story.details1: Established in 2018, Fore Coffee is a passionate coffee startups aiming to brew the best specialty coffee for our customer. As our name derived from the word forest, we aim to grow fast, strong, tall and bring life to our surrounding. We want our existence to increase coffee quality for our community.
our-story.details2: Leveraging network and experience, we are using the latest tech for our tools and bean blend. Directly from the selected farmer, high-quality beans are processed and roasted to perfection by ourselves then passed on to our skilled barista, excitedly prepare the cup of happiness to be served to you especially.

fore-news.title: ForeNews
fore-news.details: Get the latest updates and more coffee experience from us!
